ygData.subject: Re: crushbone
ygData.msgSnippet: you have just made me the happiest dam barbarian in Norath,,,,,,,, I have been looking for some way to get better armor, and make some money forever. THANK YOU
ygData.messageBody:
you have just made me the happiest dam barbarian in Norath,,,,,,,,
I have been looking for some way to get better armor, and make some money
forever. THANK YOU
how hard are the dry bones to kill, and how often does the ones with the
armor spawn

Arathorne, Solsek Ro


>From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] crushbone
>Date: Wed, 16 Jun 1999 14:19:43 -0400
>
>From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
>I didnt say that they both jumped me i was wondering why the heck she hit
>me
>for 98 and had double attack when she cnned blue. No you odnt need magical
>weapons to hit a drybones
>
> > ----------
> > From: mark mark[SMTP:markerob@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 1:54 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] crushbone
> >
> > From: mark mark <markerob@...>
> >
> > I believe that once you attack a guard you are attacked on site by any
> > other
> > guards in the zone, untill you zone out and back in. I killed some
>guards
> > in
> > qeynos, was walking around after and another guard that wasn't there
> > autoattacked me. Oh, do you need magic to hit the drybone skeles..
> > Arathorne, solsek ro
> >
> >
> > >From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
> > >Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > >To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> > >Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] crushbone
> > >Date: Wed, 16 Jun 1999 13:31:00 -0400
> > >
> > >From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
> > >
> > >Arathorne.
> > >
> > >my only advice to you is get in a good group around level 20-22 and
>youll
> > >rock CB.
> > >
> > > > ----------
> > > > From: mark mark[SMTP:markerob@...]
> > > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 1:23 PM
> > > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] crushbone
> > > >
> > > > From: mark mark <markerob@...>
> > > >
> > > > Does anyone have any advice for a lev 18 warrior traveling to
> > crushbone
> > > > for
> > > > the first time? I am looking for a two handed Dwarvish axe.
> > > >
> > > > Arathorne, solsek ro
